<script>
        var xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
        xhr.open("GET", "i18n_helper.htm", false);
        xhr.onreadystatechange = function () {
          if (xhr.readyState === 4) {
            if ((xhr.status >= 200 && xhr.status < 300) || xhr.status === 304 ||
                (!xhr.status && xhr.responseText)) {
              document.write(xhr.responseText);
            }
          }
        }
        try {
          xhr.send();
        } catch (ex) {}
      </script>
